Title: Hera Pheri
Writer: Siddique (story), Lal (story), Neeraj Vora (dialogue), Neeraj Vora (screenplay), Anand S. Vardhan (story)
Actors: Akshay Kumar, Sunil Shetty, Paresh Rawal, Tabu
Plot: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?
